objects.text:
Lightweight Non-Greasy Formula
SPF 50 Broad Spectrum Protection
Blue Light Defense Technology
Suitable for All Skin Types

product_details.name: The Derma Co 1% Hyaluronic Sunscreen Aqua Gel SPF 50 PA++++ I For Oily, Dry, Acne-prone Skin | Ultra Lightweight Texture I Non-Greasy I No White Cast | Broad Spectrum Protection & Blue Light Protection | For Men & Women | 30 g
product_details.description: Country of Origin: India. Product Dimensions: 3 x 3 x 11 cm; 30 g. Item Weight: 30 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 30 x 30 x 110 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 30.0 Grams. Generic Name: Sunscreen.

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, professional layout promoting a skincare product, set against a soft, gradient aqua background with subtle circular and wave line motifs for a fresh, minimal aesthetic. The primary title is split into two stacked lines using bold typography (`heading_1` and `heading_2`), giving a strong, eye-catching emphasis. Below that, the vibrant tagline in orange (`subheading_1` and `subheading_2`) highlights the core product's feature. A product description list (`description`) provides key benefits in an easy-to-read format. A bold price tag (`price`) and a prominent orange rounded call-to-action button (`cta_background` with `cta` text) enhance clarity and conversion focus, while a tube product image (`product_image`) anchors the visual design.

**Color Palette:**  
- Aqua Blue #E0F7FA  
- Teal #006064  
- Orange #FF9800  
- Cool Gray #333333  
- White #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image presents a clean, vibrant, and professional color palette centered around shades of orange, white, and teal. The dominant **bright orange (#F7931E)** conveys energy, summery warmth, and UV protection, immediately drawing attention to the SPF 50 label and key product claims. **White (#FFFFFF)** balances the boldness of the orange, creating a clean, clinical feel aligned with dermatological trust. **Teal (#6EC6C0)** adds a refreshing, calming accent for the brand logo, reinforcing the product’s aqua and soothing properties. These colors blend seamlessly through smooth divisions and rounded edges, maintaining clarity while ensuring the orange remains the highlight. Ideal for health-focused, energetic designs.
